abstract: Microsoft is working on new products to help companies verify the identities of employees and make it easier to manage their access to corporate computer systems.
snippet: Microsoft is working on new products to help companies verify the identities of employees and make it easier to manage their access to corporate computer systems.
lead_paragraph: Do the people who run computers for big companies have an identity crisis? That was the impression I got after spending an hour Wednesday with Bob Muglia, the president of Microsoft’s server and tool business.

headline.main: Microsoft and the Corporate Identity Crisis
